japan.hero_image_keywords: japan mount fuji cherry blossom sunset tokyo skyline night neon kyoto bamboo forest pathway
japan.description: Where centuries-old temples meet neon-lit streets. A place where precision meets poetry, and every detail tells a story.
japan.best_time: Cherry blossoms in spring (March-April) or autumn foliage (October-November)
japan.subtitle: Ancient traditions meet neon-lit modernity

tokyo.image_keywords: tokyo shibuya crossing night tokyo street neon lights tokyo tower cherry blossom
tokyo.description: A city that never sleeps, where vending machines serve hot ramen at 3 AM and serene shrines hide between skyscrapers.

things_to_do.title: Shibuya Crossing Food Tour
things_to_do.subtitle: Navigate the world's busiest intersection, then disappear into hidden alleys
things_to_do.description: The scramble of a thousand footsteps fades as you slip into narrow lanes. Steam rises from ramen bowls. Tiny izakayas hum with quiet laughter. This is Tokyo at street levelâ€”alive, intimate, delicious.
things_to_do.image_keywords: tokyo shibuya crossing night crowd shibuya street food stalls izakaya tokyo alley neon

specific_options.title: Ichiran Ramen Experience

specific_options.title: Takoyaki Stand Tour
specific_options.description: Crispy octopus balls fresh off the griddle, bonito flakes dancing in the heat
specific_options.image_keywords: takoyaki street food tokyo crispy octopus

specific_options.title: Izakaya Hopping
specific_options.description: Tiny bars, cold beer, locals at the counterâ€”the real Tokyo nightlife
specific_options.image_keywords: nonbei yokocho tokyo izakaya bar alley night

things_to_do.title: Senso-ji Temple & Asakusa
things_to_do.subtitle: Tokyo's oldest temple, where pilgrims and tourists walk the same path
things_to_do.description: Incense smoke curls upward. Red lanterns glow against morning sky. Nakamise Street hums with vendors selling traditional sweets. Here, old Tokyo persistsâ€”unhurried, reverent, timeless.
things_to_do.image_keywords: tokyo sensoji temple red lantern asakusa nakamise shopping street morning

specific_options.title: Temple Morning Prayer
specific_options.description: Join monks in chanting as sunrise light filters through temple gates
specific_options.image_keywords: sensoji temple morning prayer tokyo monks

specific_options.description: 250 meters of traditionâ€”handmade crafts, sweet bean cakes, vintage postcards
specific_options.image_keywords: nakamise street asakusa shopping traditional tokyo

specific_options.title: Rickshaw Tour

specific_options.image_keywords: asakusa rickshaw tour tokyo traditional

things_to_do.title: TeamLab Borderless
things_to_do.subtitle: Step into a living digital dreamscape where art flows around you
things_to_do.description: Walls dissolve. Flowers bloom across your feet. Light cascades like water. This isn't a museumâ€”it's an alternate universe where technology breathes, and wonder is the only rule.

kyoto.image_keywords: kyoto fushimi inari torii gates kyoto bamboo grove arashiyama kyoto geisha gion district
kyoto.description: Japan's ancient capital where every corner reveals a temple, a garden, or a glimpse of geisha disappearing into wooden teahouses.

things_to_do.title: Fushimi Inari Shrine Hike
things_to_do.subtitle: Ten thousand vermillion gates lead you up the sacred mountain
things_to_do.description: Each torii gate is a donated prayer. As you climb, the crowd thins. By mid-mountain, there's only birdsong, mossy stone foxes, and endless red tunnels glowing in dappled light.
things_to_do.best_time: Early morning (6-8 AM) or late afternoon
things_to_do.image_keywords: fushimi inari thousand torii gates path kyoto red shrine gates mountain morning light

specific_options.title: Full Mountain Circuit
specific_options.description: Complete the sacred loop to the summitâ€”4km of gates, forest, and foxes
specific_options.image_keywords: fushimi inari summit hike kyoto mountain torii

specific_options.title: Lower Shrine Tour
specific_options.description: Stay below for the iconic gates and temple complexâ€”easier, still magical
specific_options.image_keywords: fushimi inari main shrine kyoto gates entrance

specific_options.title: Sunrise Photography
specific_options.description: Arrive before dawn to catch golden hour light streaming through the gates
specific_options.image_keywords: fushimi inari sunrise golden hour kyoto photography

nearby_cafes: Traditional tea stalls at mountain rest points

things_to_do.title: Arashiyama Bamboo Grove
things_to_do.subtitle: Walk through towering green stalks that creak and whisper in the wind
things_to_do.description: Sunlight filters green. The air cools. Bamboo rises like cathedral columns, swaying, creaking, alive. It's otherworldlyâ€”a forest that feels like walking into a scroll painting.
things_to_do.image_keywords: arashiyama bamboo forest pathway kyoto bamboo grove green light tall stalks

specific_options.title: Morning Grove Walk
specific_options.description: Stroll the main path before crowds arriveâ€”serene, silent, surreal

specific_options.title: Tenryu-ji Temple Visit
specific_options.description: A UNESCO World Heritage site with a pond garden designed for walking meditation

specific_options.title: Togetsukyo Bridge

things_to_do.title: Traditional Tea Ceremony
things_to_do.subtitle: A quiet ritual of matcha, sweets, and centuries of mindfulness
things_to_do.description: You kneel on tatami. A host whisks matcha in slow, deliberate arcs. Each gesture is precise, purposeful. For one hour, the world shrinks to the sound of bamboo on ceramic.
things_to_do.image_keywords: kyoto tea ceremony matcha traditional gion geisha district machiya interior

bali.hero_image_keywords: bali uluwatu temple sunset cliff bali tegalalang rice terraces green bali beach sunset palm trees
bali.description: An island where every sunrise feels sacred. Rice terraces ripple green, temples cling to cliffs, and the rhythm of life moves slower, sweeter.
bali.best_time: Dry season (May-September) for clear skies and calm seas
bali.subtitle: Island of gods, rice terraces, and endless summer

ubud.image_keywords: ubud rice terraces morning mist ubud monkey forest temple ubud market traditional crafts
ubud.description: Bali's cultural heartâ€”where jungle, art, and spirituality converge in terraced green valleys.

things_to_do.title: Tegalalang Rice Terrace Walk
things_to_do.subtitle: Descend into emerald layers carved by generations of Balinese farmers
things_to_do.description: Mist hangs low in the valley. Rice stalks sway. The terraces cascade like green stairs to the horizon. You walk narrow ridges, palms overhead, and realize this isn't a farmâ€”it's a living sculpture.
things_to_do.image_keywords: tegalalang rice terrace ubud green layers morning mist bali rice paddy terraces sunrise

things_to_do.title: Sacred Monkey Forest
things_to_do.subtitle: Ancient temple ruins overtaken by jungleâ€”and hundreds of curious macaques
things_to_do.description: Monkeys leap between moss-covered statues. Stone temples crumble under vines. The forest feels aliveâ€”playful, chaotic, deeply spiritual. Watch your sunglasses. They're faster than you think.
